scripts.build-docker: docker --context default build --pull -t cloudillo/cloudillo:$npm_package_version -t cloudillo/cloudillo:latest -f Dockerfile.debian .
scripts.publish-docker: docker --context default push cloudillo/cloudillo:$npm_package_version && docker --context default push cloudillo/cloudillo:latest
scripts.publish-docker-slim: docker --context default push cloudillo/cloudillo:$npm_package_version-slim && docker --context default push cloudillo/cloudillo:latest-slim
scripts.publish-docker-alpine: docker --context default push cloudillo/cloudillo:$npm_package_version-alpine && docker --context default push cloudillo/cloudillo:latest-alpine
scripts.docker-all: pnpm build-docker && pnpm build-docker-slim && pnpm build-docker-alpine && pnpm publish-docker && pnpm publish-docker-slim && pnpm publish-docker-alpine
